definitions.definition: Fully occupied with one's thoughts ; engrossed .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 18 century.

definitions.definition: That has been taken in, engulfed, imbibed, or assimilated.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the mid 18 century.

main_definition: Fully occupied with one's thoughts ; engrossed . [First attested in the mid 18 century.]
secondary_definitions: That has been taken in, engulfed, imbibed, or assimilated. [First attested in the mid 18 century.]
